headline: PPL Rate Case And Data Center Project Test Regulatory Support
summary: PPL (NYSE:PPL) has requested approval for an electric distribution rate increase that could change monthly bills for residential customers in Pennsylvania. The proposal is under review by the Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission, with public input expected to shape the outcome. PPL is also seeking approval to build new high-voltage transmission lines to serve a large data center, raising questions about how costs are shared across customers. PPL, trading at $36.31, operates in the...
